edu.cmu.sphinx.fst

Class ImmutableState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.State
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.ImmutableState

  • public class ImmutableState
extends State
    The fst's immutable state implementation. holds its outgoing Arc objects in a fixed size array not allowing additions/deletions.
    Author:
    John Salatas

      • Fields inherited from class edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.State

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImmutableState

        protected ImmutableState()
        Default protected constructor. An ImmutableState cannot be created directly. It needs to be deserialized as part of an ImmutableFst.
        See Also:
        ImmutableFst.loadModel(String)
